column2: Lovely Grounds To End Up In
column3: My Mother is buried here and I will join her when I pass on. It is peaceful, clean, easy to reach with good parking. The office staff is nice and the lounge area is welcoming. It is expensive, but at the same time, if you want family burial history itâ€™s as good as it gets.

column2: Let me preface it by saying I do not enjoy funerals.
column3: Let me preface by saying I do not enjoy funerals. Nearly 70 years old and cemeteries still creep me out. This is a pleasaent cemetery near the Santa Monica mountains. Hard to say more, nice people and convenient to Highway 101. Just not my thing to visit them.
We visited as part of a Boy Scout activity to help maintain the graves. I am not sure if you would normally visit if you didn't have someone buried here but it is a nice and quiet place.
tough times made easier, beautiful, clean and peaceful. what more could you want for your loved one. right off the freeway easy to gain access and leave, close so we can visit
The Staff is genuinely concerned that all family wishes are met. They have a beautiful Veteran's section and annually pay tribute to our heroes on Veteran's Day.
